Published November 20 2014

Amazon Fire Stick Review

Amazon Fire Stick Review — Matt Burns: “There’s a bit of lag and hesitation while navigating items on the Fire TV stick. The navigation is smooth enough, but not silky smooth like on the full fledged Fire TV.” Drat; inputs that lag rank near the top of my list of tech-related loathings. I’ll wait to see a video review, but this is still disheartening.

Enjoy your day.
